data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Golovatch, Sergei I., Vandenspiegel, Didier (2014): Koponenius gen. nov., a new genus of the millipede family Haplodesmidae from the Himalayas of India and Nepal (Diplopoda: Polydesmida). Zootaxa 3894 (1): 141-151, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3894.1.11
